document_data.name: ''Ring of Teeth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ring of teeth''''' was a severe-looking enchanted ring from the [[Elven Catacombs]] of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: ''Ring of teeth'' appeared to be a jagged metal band decorated to be reminiscent of sharp teeth.
document_data.Powers: The ring gave its wearer the ability to cast ''[[inflict serious wounds]]'' spell. ''Ring of teeth'' had five charges of the spell. The ring was also resistant to extreme temperatures, surviving white-hot flames of ancient furnaces.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''ring of teeth'' could be found in one of the rooms of Elven Catacombs underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]], guarded by soulless [[orog]] thralls of the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. Most looted treasures in the room was stashed in the Cult's chests with the ''ring of teeth'' tossed into raiding molten rocks of a ever-lit magical furnace.
